resources.string:
I am rich
I am very health & successful
I deserve it
I am glad
Thank you for your purchase. You have unlocked all premium features for ALL OF PERKEDEL apps. Congratulations!\nPlease keep this software installed to keep your premium features

This piece of software was made for the purpose of parody. Any resemblance of software products: real, fake, or defunct; are purely coincidental and made up.

Creation of this product subjects for the act of satire, hence does not condone nor express any disparagement, insult, nor callouts whatsoever (even if some strings may found to have said so).
Whoa whoa whoa, I seem couldn\u0027t observe where you installed this unlock from..
You downloaded the APK directly!? But..
Thancc for your purchase yeay!! ... You serious right? No, I mean you could also just..
We are still us. No change, although we are yes ran out of money so.., other ways of help is appreciated.
It's fine.., although we are yes ran out of money so.., other ways of help is appreciated.
But seriously, we are yes ran out of money so.., other ways of help is appreciated.

I mean seriously, we actually ran out of money so we'll take it (pls don\u0027t refund tho coz we mean it). And uh.. you can redownload the manually APK from our Source code and yep, it still works just so you know.. yeah.\nAlso uhh.. root cheat (set install source to market) or not uh.. I really ran out of money. Pls give me money thancc.
Found Paywallism or Partialism in Perkedel apps?\nREPORT IT! BUZZERS WILL BE PUNISHED.

At Perkedel, we make apps for Gratis, Open Source, & FULL VERSION. We do not ask anything in exchange, except to let everyone know, we have this cool stuffs.\n As the result, we do not have revenue to support our life support systems. In fact, we also are scrounging like maniacs on streets, begging for money just to let us live for at least 1 nanosecond. Despite of all this, we are required to keep being sane, and always give for the people. Money can only be obtained under voluntary & a goodwill of our customers.
These days, lots of Open Source apps, of course asks for donations. However also, that includes apps that no longer just ask donations, but now, EXCHANGE. Exchange, that turns it back to basic: Wani Piro (it costs coins). While this does therefore restore their life support functionality significantly, it sacrifices the comfort for all people. Rich people won't feel nothing, but the less than those, will. Including us, even say we would be rich later (for some reasons btw).
Today, Perkedel has been running the campaign that will catch those abusers that are & were doing contracts with us. We will not tolerate any amount of abuse done within our community, both by external, and internal, including the technique this `I am rich` is using such as Installation source of this Unlocker APK (Google Play? Or pirated?). If you find any incident involving publication of Perkedel Technologies such as: - Main app is paywalled - Main app is limited in feature (even just a little bit) and you must use Unlocker key to unlock those. Not to be confused with FUTO's Buy function, since the License is just to support & access to customer service, nothing walled otherwise. - You've been asked to pay greasing fee (Uang Pelicin) just to make the service work - You've been inappropriately asked to pay any sum of money / fee at a supposedly already funded event such as in Job Hiring. ... Please immediately report to us using these contact cards below. Do not be afraid. Bad Whistleblowers & Buzzers will be punished on the spot, and we will provide protection as must as we can.:
(SUBJECT: Paywallism in Perkedel, PRODUCT_TITLE) Product name: ___________ Sauce URL: ___________ Describe what was paywalled in detail: ____________
